annotations.description: Not your Mama's Custard. This drink was created in honor of the last film I acted in. I wanted to do two things with it, firstly I wanted to use ingredients ...
annotations.title: Original Cocktail: The Shark Infested Custard

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Plantation Pineapple Rum
.5oz (15ml) Smith & Cross Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Licor 43
1oz (30ml) Coconut Cream
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.25oz  Angostura Amaro Float
Pineapple Frond, Orchid Garnish
Half Lime hollowed out with sugar cube in it
dash of Lemon Hart 151, Light on Fire
Sprinkle cinnamon on fire.

Shake and pour into cored pineapple. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LdT2tVYHxhg
title: The Shark Infested Custard
